ModMetaData.name: ThermalsStuffed
ModMetaData.author: Skullywag
ModMetaData.description:
Changes vanilla thermal generators so that they can be made with stuff.
Energy Health Flammable Beauty Steel generator: 3600W 500 20% -40 Silver generator: 4200W 350 20% -40 Gold generator: 5000W 300 20% -40 Plasteel generator: 5200W 1400 10% -40 Uranium generator: 6000W 1250 0% -40
